title: Security Flow Chart
description: Highlights the security checks during user interactions, such as login attempts and account changes.
steps: User performs an action (e.g., login, account change)
Action is intercepted by a security middleware
Security checks are performed (e.g., token validation, IP checks)
If action passes security checks, it is allowed to proceed
If action fails security checks, it is blocked and logged
User is notified of any security concerns (e.g., unauthorized access attempt)
